sentences.sentence: Hundreds of people today defied the ban on political gatherings.
sentences.translation: 今天有数百人违抗禁止政治集会的规定。

sentences.sentence: Richards had defied doctors by using an oxygen tent to recover from his hamstring injury ahead of schedule to play in the showpiece last Saturday.
sentences.translation: 理查兹无视医生的建议，在上周六的比赛中提前使用氧气帐篷从肌腱伤势中恢复。
